Alteration 5

Fort of the Ancients

MA, LA Pangaea

Ritual
N4
spell id [id]: 252
effect number [effect_number]: 63
damage [damage]: 10
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 35N
Remote Fort Construction:10 ?
Source Terrain : Sea, Forest
Cannot target geo mask : (Deep Sea)
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
In ancient times, Pangaea made its forts not from mud and mortar but bramble and birch. This ritual forces nature to form a complete fortress in a matter of weeks, sturdy enough to rival stone walls. The ritual can only be cast in forests or shallow seas, where an appropriate amount of vegetation can be found.
